1.name: mansab
1.msg:
@ Sweet tunes, delightful delights,
Happy birthday to you, Mansab, take a flight.

@ Every moment, every year, we celebrate,
Your kind heart, your spirit elevates.
Days filled with laughter, dreams that bloom,
May your birthday be filled with joy's perfume.
Happy birthday, dear Mansab, may your spirit soar,
May you forever shine and explore.
May all your wishes and aspirations be granted,
May you be blessed with abundance and enchantment.

2.name: mummy
2.msg:
@ Mum, the sun shines brighter today,
For it's your birthday, a special day.

@ Happy birthday to the best mummy in the world! You're the most caring, loving, and supportive person I know. I'm so lucky to have you as my mum. I hope you have a wonderful day filled with all the things you love. I love you very much.
